rr_event.title: Central And East London (City, South West)
rr_event.location: CENTRAL AND E LONDON
rr_event.description: All Directions London Triathlon 2012 - Saturdays closures will be contained in the Excel area, Sunday from midnight there will be a lane closure on The Highway in both directions until 5am when all closures will be implemented from The Excel Centre at Canning Town to Westminster Bridge including Aspen Way, Limehouse Link, The Highway, Upper and Lower Thames Streets, Victoria Embankment. There are also restrictions on the A13 westbound at Canning Town, A13 East India Dock Road at West India Dock Road and Burdett Roads. At Midday, the western closures from Bridge Street to Tower Hill will be reopened. The remaining closures in the east will remain in until the event is finished.
rr_event.remark: There is still currently severe congestion on Aspen Way westbound to Preston Roundabout. The A13 westbound between Cotton Street and Burdett Road. The Isle of Dogs area.

rr_event.title: M4 (Heston)
rr_event.location: On M4 between Great West Road / A4 and M4 Junction 3 On Slip
rr_event.description: Eastbound and westbound direction. The M4 has a 7.5T weight restriction in both directions between junctions 2 and 3.
rr_event.remark: A weight restriction of 7.5 tonnes remains in both directions between junctions two and three. For further information please refer to the Highways Agency website.

rr_event.title: Victoria (Westminster)
rr_event.location: VICTORIA
rr_event.description: Victoria Station Upgrade works Various road restrictions in the Victoria area as part of the continuing Victoria Station Upgrade works and the Victoria Circle development. Wilton Road is closed to all traffic except buses and taxis, diversions are in place. Allington Street is also closed. Delays are possible in the Victoria area, especially at peak times.
rr_event.remark: Due to long term works associated with the Victoria Station Upgrade and Victoria Circle Development, there are restrictions on Bressenden Place; Allington Street is closed at Victoria Street (with diversions); Vauxhall Bridge Road is reduced to two lanes southbound at the junction with Victoria Street; Wilton Road is reduced to one lane northbound at the junction of Victoria Street, with access restricted to buses, taxis and cycles. In addition, Victoria Street is reduced to one lane (from two) eastbound between Palace Street and Buckingham Gate for electricity works. Traffic is moderate and moving well on the Victoria gyratory.
